projects.title: Halocrypt
projects.description: I have written a large share of tech infra for Halocrypt (a cryptic hunt) organized by my high school's team, including the server and the frontend. These websites handled hundreds of thousands of database hits over 4 days and were used by more than 10,000 unique visitors from 80+ countries

projects.title: CollegeWarden
projects.description: I made CollegeWarden as a project to track my college applications, notes and important documents. Storing them in one safe location. For my peace of mind, I baked in client side encryption into the web app; all information is stored securely on the backend and only decrypted on device.

projects.title: Micro Frameworks and tools
projects.description: I usually develop my own solutions for building frontend apps, from tiny, performant VDom libraries to disappearing atomic css build tools. Anything that makes making fast web apps enjoyable
